00029 class simbio_isis_result extends simbio
00030 {
00031     # private properties
00032     var $res_result = false;
00033     var $query_string = '';
00034     var $query_type = '';
00035     var $num_rows = 0;
00036 
00037 
00045     function simbio_isis_result($str_query, $str_query_type, $res_conn)
00046     {
00047         $this->query_string = $str_query;
00048         $this->query_type = $str_query_type;
00049         $this->sendQuery($res_conn);
00050     }
00051 
00052 
00059     function sendQuery($res_conn)
00060     {
00061         if (($this->query_type == 'search') OR ($this->keywords == '$')) {
00062             $this->res_result = @isis_search($this->query_string, $res_conn);
00063         } else {
00064             $this->res_result = @isis_query($this->query_string, $res_conn);
00065         }
00066 
00067         if ($this->res_result) {
00068             // set the num rows property
00069             $this->num_rows = @isis_num_rows($this->res_result);
00070             return true;
00071         } else {
00072             return false;
00073         }
00074     }
00075 
00076 
00082     function fetch_assoc()
00083     {
00084         if (!$this->res_result) {
00085             $this->error = "No Resultset can be fetched from query";
00086             return null;
00087         } else {
00088             $_rec = @isis_fetch_flat_array($this->res_result);
00089         }
00090 
00091         return $_rec;
00092     }
00093 
00094 
00100     public function fetch_row()
00101     {
00102         return $this->fetch_assoc();
00103     }
00104 
00105 
00111     function free_result()
00112     {
00113         if ($this->res_result) {
00114             @isis_free_result($this->res_result);
00115         }
00116     }
00117 }
00118 ?>
